name: voortrekker monument
description: The Voortrekker Monument commemorates the Great Trek of the 1830s and 1840s. This massive granite structure stands as a symbol of Afrikaner heritage and history. The monument features a museum, historical exhibits, and panoramic views of Pretoria.
seasonal_info: Best visited in spring or autumn
